biotools.summary: The Bovine Genome Database includes mechanisms to improve annotation of the bovine genome and to integrate the genome sequence with other genomics data. It includes GBrowse genome browsers, the Apollo Annotation Editor, a quantitative trait loci (QTL) viewer, BLAST databases and gene pages.

bioschemas.name: The Bovine Genome Database (BGD)
